summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the Certbot Google Cloud DNS plugin, validating the authenticator and DNS client behavior across initialization, credential management, client caching, authentication flow, TXT record creation, retrieval, deletion, zone lookup, polling mechanisms, TTL handling, splitâ€‘horizon configurations, and various error scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the Certbot integration with Google Cloud DNS, enabling reliable automated SSL/TLS certificate issuance by confirming proper authentication and DNS record operations.
